parameter.units_comment: space delimited ISO 8601 format up to seconds

parameter.comment: Computation threads for shared memory computation (default=auto)

file.name: source_data/discharge_AvonBeth.dat
file.comment: name of csv file with discharge information (time and rate columns)

scale.comment: scales the data on the file by this factor (not time)
